DOC.brief_summary: The primary specific aim study determine overweight obese premenopausal woman lose weight long term weight loss impact biomarkers associate breast cancer risk .
DOC.brief_title: Low Fat Versus Protein Sparing Diet Weight Loss & Impact Biomarkers Associated With Breast Cancer Risk
DOC.detailed_description: We examine low carbohydrate diet ( 40 % carbohydrate , 30 % protein , 30 % fat ) versus low fat diet ( 60 % carbohydrate , 20 % protein , 20 % fat ) determine impact dietary pattern , combine exercise , weight loss , body shape body composition . Inclusion Criteria : - Aged 30 old - Premenopausal ( may confirm FSH ) - No previous diagnosis cancer ( except non-melanomatous skin cancer ) - Body mass index 25-34 kg/m2 - Women must expect live Columbus area next 18 month - All woman must present letter medical clearance primary care physician Exclusion Criteria : - Pregnant woman woman plan become pregnant study period enrol . Women become pregnant intervention withdrawn study . - Women already participate formal weight loss program ( Weight Watchers ) eligible . - Women medical history precludes adherence either two dietary pattern also exclude . This include history renal insufficiency , gluten enteropathy , Crohn 's disease medical condition significantly impact nutritional status metabolism . Women either type I control type II diabetes eligible participate trial . - All medical problem must manage control . Lipid profile , blood glucose , hemoglobin A1c , blood pressure assess screen visit . These result review study physician . Women abnormal value , discretion study physician , would benefit medical management refer primary care physician prior consider enrollment .
